name: flutterclient
description: Flutter Client The Flutter Client is a mobile app for the JVx framework. It's super generic and renders work-screens dynamically. The app supports all layout features of JVx and comes with a default menu and login mechanism. It's designed as standalone app and also as library. This means that you can easily extend the library and create your own app.

scripts.update-version: node scripts/update_app_version.js commit && node scripts/update_app_version.js version && node scripts/update_app_version.js date
